name: search_location
description: Search for a location or place on the map.
parameters: {'search_query': 'What location or place would you like to search for?'}

name: voice_search
description: Initiate a voice search for a location or place.

name: sign_in
description: Sign in to the account associated with the app.

name: toggle_layers
description: Toggle or access additional map layers (e.g., traffic, satellite).

name: navigate_to_tab
description: Navigate to a specific tab in the app.
parameters: {'tab_name': 'Which tab would you like to navigate to? ["Explore", "Go", "Saved", "Contribute", "Updates"]'}

name: get_directions
description: Get directions from the current location to a destination.
parameters: {'destination': 'Where would you like to get directions to?'}

name: recenter_map
description: Re-center the map to the user's current location.
